short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate Jira remaining estimates and show code reviewers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculates Jira remaining estimates and shows code reviewers.
Works in NORTAL environments only.

Changelog:
v2.4 - Colors the 'Rejected' status
v2.3 - Improved regex matching for code reviewers
